story_zako_battle_26_08/3701_0101_0200_1:
I thought your partner Pokémon was leading us to
the ocean?
story_zako_battle_26_08/3701_0101_0300_1:
You’re right! Where’s the ocean? Why did you lead
us out here, my dude?!
story_zako_battle_26_08/3701_0101_0400_1: Wait...don’t tell me you suddenly hate swimming!
story_zako_battle_26_08/3701_0101_0500_1:
Can’t you see we’re having a serious conversation
here? Don’t even think about butting in!
story_zako_battle_26_08/3701_0501_0100_1:
Sync Pair Pinger? I don’t know what you’re
talking about.
story_zako_battle_26_08/3701_0501_0200_1: As long as you don’t hate swimming, we’re cool!
story_zako_battle_26_08/3801_0401_0400_1: Hah! Tricking grown-ups is easy as pie!
story_zako_battle_26_08/3801_0402_0600_1: Hah! Tricking grown-ups is easy as pie!
story_zako_battle_26_08/3801_0101_0700_1:
Yeah, it is. All we have to do is cry and they
come running!
story_zako_battle_26_08/3801_0501_0100_1:
Hey! What’s the point of tricking grown-ups if
we’re just gonna lose?
story_zako_battle_26_08/3801_0501_0200_1:
You went all out against crying kids?! Grown-ups
sure are scary.
